spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . holding her hand- Gabrielle Giffords opened her eyes for the first time. "It was raw courage. It was raw strength. It was so beautiful and so moving," said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. She wanted us to know that she was with us a hundred percent and understood everything we were saying. If all goes well, Gabrielle Giffords may be "out of the woods" on Friday, said Dr. Peter Rhee, trauma chief at University Medical Center, who has treated soldiers in Iraq and Afghanistan.

Asked whether he planned to stay another four years at Google to collect stock awards worth$ 100 million, Eric Schmidt said: Yes, that is my plan. Google said last month co-founder Larry Page would take over as chief executive from April 4 while Eric Schmidt would assume the role of executive chairman.
